group_1.textLeft: Okay, let's get started already!@Mitama, what is marriage to you?

group_1.textRight: Marriage...it's a wonderful thing@filled with love and romance.
...That said, marriage is also about@becoming a family, isn't it?
Of course, I am interested in the romance aspect,
but if I were to get married, I'd probably@be very careful about selecting my partner.

group_1.textLeft: I see, I see. What kind of person is your type?

group_1.textRight: Weeell, it's important that we share the same@values and that we're comfortable together, but...
Before considering that,@I need money to live, so...
Combining romance and reality, I think my@ideal partner would be an oil tycoon♪

group_1.textLeft: An oil tycoon...@It seems like it'd be difficult to meet one.

group_1.textRight: Money, huh... Well, it is true you need@money to be able to live, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: ...There's certainly truth to that...
But, but! Even if I was poor, I think@I would be happy if I had love!
That's why I want to marry the person I looove!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* That way of thinking@is very lovely too, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: By that, you mean being together@with Hayato...right?

group_1.textRight: W-weeell, that's who, but...ehehe.
Before the marriage, there's the@proposal to dream about!
Aimi, do you have an ideal proposal?

group_1.textLeft: Mmm, I think I'd be happy with@anything from the person I love,
but if we're talking about my ideal@fantasy, it's gotta be the classic...

group_1.textRight: Aimi, there's something important@I need to tell you today.

group_1.textLeft: Tell me...?
A...ring?!

group_1.textRight: Will you...marry me?

group_1.textLeft: ~~~~!@[wait:1.2][chara:302301:eyeClose_0][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Yes, of course―!
Wow...the classic proposal! Very nice!

group_1.textRight: But like, it doesn't have to be@that clean and perfect either...
For example, us living together@as a couple in the same place...

group_1.textLeft: It's been so long since we started@living together, Hayato...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, and it's all thanks to you@that every day is so fun.
...Hey, Aimi.
Would you stay by my side, forever and ever?

group_1.textLeft: Eh, that's...

group_1.textRight: Let's get hitched, Aimi.

group_1.textLeft: ...Aimi, you're doing it again.

group_1.textRight: Ah―! Sorry, sorry, I was just getting so into it.

group_1.textLeft: But just listening to you talk@is making my heart flutter.

group_1.textRight: Right? Don't you have ideal scenarios like that too?

group_1.textLeft: Eh, ah...me?!
Mm, my heart's racing now, but...@Marriage...marriage, huh...
It's hard to say anything when it's@suddenly your turn to go, isn't it...?

group_1.textRight: Then how about what kind of family you want?@...Shouldn't that be easier?

group_1.textLeft: Family...
Oh! Look, Kokoro.
Look at the pretty flowers. I wonder what@they're called.

group_1.textRight: Those are azaleas.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? You're surely guessing.
You're just saying the name of the first@flower that comes to mind.

group_1.textRight: What? Am I wrong?
They're azaleas, right?@Right, Kokoro?
Sure enough, the whole family being close@and going out to play on holidays...
Yeah, I want my family to be@full of smiling faces together.
I think that's what a happy family is to me.
*Giggle*@Isn't that lovely?
I see...
When you fall in love and get married,@you become a family...
And then you might even have a child.

group_1.textLeft: You'd make a great mother, Aimi!

group_1.textRight: Ehehehehe...@You think sooo...?
Okay now, Masara,@do you have any ideal images?

group_1.textLeft: Me...? I don't really have any in particular...

group_1.textRight: Come on~ You don't have to@be shy around here, okay?

group_1.textLeft: It has nothing to do with shyness, though...

group_1.textRight: Masara, I'm kinda curious about@your thoughts on love too!
That's right...we haven't heard@much from you, have we?
Weeell?

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't have any sort of ideal@vision of marriage like all of you do...

group_1.textRight: Why is that?

group_1.textLeft: Because marriage, as you call it,@is nothing more than a contract.
